name: Transformi - Character/Transformation Generator
description:
Transformi is a small character and transformation generator to help give you inspiration in creating art and stories!

Randomly create human characters and then subject them to also randomised transformations, including 20 anthropomorphic animal forms, as well as gender transformations!

!! The program may trigger a warning from your antivirus software, this is a known issue with PyInstaller. If this happens you will need to disable your antivirus temporarily, or place the program in an exception folder !!

I consider the project decently "Done" for now, but i may return to it to add features at a later time:

-Currently, it is only capable of generating humans and anthros but I would like to add feral character forms, as well as things like robotic forms

-I would also like to make the transformation text for anthro-to-anthro tfs more interesting, currently it only really says much of anything when a human tfs

-Adding features that allow you to customise the output (selecting specific forms, give precise parameters for transformations)

I've never done anything like this before, i'm more of an artist - and not one to do big programming projects, so i'll just be amazed if it works - please tell me if you have any issues.
